item.description:
WOMEN HEALING WOMEN with Heather Joyce Wolfe RN, RPP
Saturdays Jan 14, and or 28 ~ 1.30 - 5 pm  Cost: $85 each class                                           

Yoga means Union. Each of us has a place inside that longs for Union with our Self ~Love ~Light~ Spirit~ Source~ God. Through movement, music, sacred sound, silence, sharing, touch, energy healing and clear intention we will find that place of deep connection inside ourselves – the place that we often neglect to nurture. We will play with balancing the Five Elements of Ether, Air, Fire, Water and Earth to move toward right relationship with ourselves and others. This class will help you create your unique discipline to support the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual aspects of your Being at this time. The goal is to leave feeling nurtured, centered, balanced, revitalized, healed and connected, to encourage you to be your best in the coming days.  There will be an opportunity to continue as a group once a month, which would be decided by consensus at the end of the day. Call Heather to register at 978.857.3776 or email celthealer@aol.com with WOMEN in subject line. Please also RSVP for this Meetup.
item.name: The Yoga of Nurturance with Heather Joyce Wolfe
